data.message:
HEY EVERYONE!

REALLY CAN'T STRESS HOW IMPORTANT THIS IS. I NEED YOUR HELP HERE. My mix has been picked in the final 10 for a Pukka Up Competition for a chance to play in London infront of judges with the chance of going to play at AMNESIA IN IBIZA! 

All you have to do is click on the link on the Pukka Up FAN PAGE and like my soundcloud mix on the page! PLEASE HELP! 

IF I GET ENOUGH LIKES YOU CAN HELP SEND ME TO LONDON!!

click on the link below and simply like the post by Pukka Up FAN PAGE

https://www.facebook.com/pukkaupfanpage/posts/10152219683566214

HELP MAKE A DREAM COME TRUE.

Many Thanks! Chrissy.
